name: FLT Academy
about: FLT Academy is a premier aviation training institution based in Utah, renowned for its comprehensive and professional flight training programs. With a commitment to quality and safety, FLT Academy offers a range of certifications, including private pilot, instrument rating, commercial pilot, and multi-engine add-ons. Our Career-Track programs, in partnership with SkyWest Airlines, provide a direct pathway to a career in aviation, complete with mentorship and guaranteed interviews. Our state-of-the-art fleet of modern aircraft, equipped with advanced avionics, and in-person ground schools ensure students receive the best possible training. With a 4.9 out of 5 rating from over 1100 reviews, FLT Academy is Utahâ€™s top-rated flight school, dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals with personalized instruction and a supportive learning environment. Join FLT Academy to embark on a successful career in aviation.
